DataElement.preferredName: Performed Specimen Collection Information Source Type Code OMOP CDM Specimen Type Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed action of gathering samples that may be used for subsequent analysis._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._A coded value specifying an identifiable class of an entity or activity based on common qualities._A foreign key referring to the Concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the system of record from which the Specimen was represented in the source data.

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Specimen Type Concept Identifier
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key referring to the Concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the system of record from which the Specimen was represented in the source data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.
